程序包 org.xmlunit

XMLUnit helps testing code that creates XML.

请参阅: 说明

  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    ConfigurationException
    Exception thrown when anything inside JAXP throws a *ConfigurationException.
    XMLUnitException
    Base class of any Exception thrown within XMLUnit.

程序包org.xmlunit的说明

XMLUnit helps testing code that creates XML.
